text: whw aladhi khalaq alsamawat wal'ard wama fihina fi stt ayam, wakan earshuh ealaa alma' qabl dhlk; lykhtbrkm 'ayukum 'ahsan lah taetan wemla wahu ma kan khalsana lilah mwafqana lamaa kan ealayh rasul allah salaa allah ealayh wslm. walayin qult -ayha alrswl- lhwla' almushrikin min qwmk: 'iinakum mabeuthun ahya'an baed mwtkm, lsareu 'iilaa altkdhyb wqalu: ma hdha alquran aldhy ttlwh ealayna 'illa sihr byin
